2.text: Get into groups of five. Each member should construct a sentence about himself/herself using one of the adverbs given below. The leader of each group should report the sentences to the class.
2.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Get into groups of five. Each member should construct a sentence about himself/herself using one of the adverbs given below. The leader of each group should report the sentences to the class.</prosody></speak>

3.text: e.g. :- Dinith usually gets up at 5.30 in the morning. usually/normally/sometimes/rarely/often/always/never
3.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>e.g. :- <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='dinit̪'>Dinith</phoneme> usually gets up at 5.30 in the morning. usually/normally/sometimes/rarely/often/always/never</prosody></speak>

5.text: Write a paragraph about yourself or one of your family members using as many adverbs of frequency as you can.
5.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Write a paragraph about yourself or one of your family members using as many adverbs of frequency as you can.</prosody></speak>

7.text: Given below is an introduction about a great Sri Lankan woman. Read it carefully.
7.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Given below is an introduction about a great Sri Lankan woman. Read it carefully.</prosody></speak>

9.text: Jayanthi Kuru-Utumpala was the first Sri Lankan to reach the summit of Mount Everest. This great achievement of hers makes Sri Lanka one of the few countries in the world in which a woman has been the first person to reach the highest mountain peak on Earth.
9.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'><phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='d͡ʒajant̪i'>Jayanthi</phoneme> Kuru-Utumpala was the first Sri Lankan to reach the summit of Mount Everest. This great achievement of hers makes Sri Lanka one of the few countries in the world in which a woman has been the first person to reach the highest mountain peak on Earth.</prosody></speak>

10.text: Jayanthi was born in 1979 in Colombo. She studied at Bishop's College and later completed a BA degree in English Literature from the Delhi University and a Masters Degree from the University of Sussex, U.K.
10.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'><phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='d͡ʒajant̪i'>Jayanthi</phoneme> was born in 1979 in Colombo. She studied at Bishop's College and later completed a BA degree in English Literature from the Delhi University and a Masters Degree from the University of Sussex, U.K.</prosody></speak>
